subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Relying heavily on perimeter shooting and the hot hand of the newcomer Avery Patterson, St. John’s began the 2006-7 season Friday night with a 74-53 victory over North Florida.
snippet: Relying heavily on perimeter shooting and the hot hand of the newcomer Avery Patterson, St. John’s began the 2006-7 season Friday night with a 74-53 victory over North Florida.
